Package com.topcoder.rules.engine

Interface Summary
RulesEngine  
RulesEngineServer The RulesEngineServer provides shared access to RulesEngines through RMI.
 

Class Summary
RulesEngineHome This class provides access to RulesEngines through the RulesEngineServer using RMI.
RulesEngineImpl The server side implementation of the RulesEngine.
RulesEngineInterface This class is an interface to the RulesEngine.
RulesEngineServerImpl The server side implementation of the RulesEngineServer.
RuleSet This class is called upon by the RulesEngine to evaluate Rules, Conditions, and Expressions.
RuleSetCompiler This class compiles the RuleSet object by generating code and using the TCCompilerClassLoader.
